Articles.Content:
My computer has 3 GB of DDDR2Ram

If you don\'t know DDDR2 became outdated in 2005

My computer was built in 2011

My graphics card is a Nvidia Geforce 210

I want to know if everyone thinks this is a good graphics card.

Here is the link to its specification page.

http://www.geforce.com/hardware/desktop-gpus/geforce-210/specifications

Known habits of this graphics card is overheating when I put a HAMBURGER near my computer. :\'(

I can barely play minecraft and in KSP I must keep the terrain detail at 0% otherwise KSP crashes instantly.

All day my computer is like :Trollolololol: and i\'m like : >: all day

I\'m not really up on my graphics cards, but that does not look very impressive, especially not as a gaming card.

The best I can really do is show you my card (an HD6770), and tell you that it can manage Skyrim and GTA4 pretty close to maxed (would probably be able to do so for GTA on a 1280x720 monitor rather than a 1600x900). I would still consider my card to be the entry level for gaming though, and I plan to replace it in about 18 months if I can.

If you have DDR2 RAM as your main memory right now, you should probably go out and pick up a stick of 3 or 4 GB DDR3, just as a general performance thing.
no, its awefull. its the lowest possible graphics card, 3 GENERATIONS AGO. dependent on your budget, i would go for a 6790 (i have ) or some thing more powerfull. above a gtx 550 ti.

I have 2GBs of DDR3 RAM...

My computers core is an AMD Sempron.

My graphics chip is ATI Radeon 3100.

My computer is like yours...

Except more up to date.

I can\'t use explosions + mod on minecraft.(As soon as I set off a nuke Minecraft crashes.
My computer cost 400 dollars and I could of got something better for 300 dollars. :\'(

My computer cost 400 dollars and I could of got something better for 300 dollars. :\'(

LOL my computer was free...

My uncle got a better PC and gave me this one.
